segments.text: This kitchen is a mess waiting to happen, starting with that sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring out uncontrollably, drenching the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's right there, foot in the filth, drying a plate like it's fine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How gross—the puddle's widening, probably seeping everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, those kids: boy on a stool, digging into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's going to drop everything and make more of a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just standing, hand out, contributing to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies is one thing, but on a wet, slippery floor?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks dirty and unstable—ugh, potential for injury.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden's neat, but inside it's repulsive negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing the water ruin those nice cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene turns my stomach with its avoidable sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone turn off that faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
